00021 #ifndef _ColumnInfo_HEADER_
00022 #define _ColumnInfo_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! \file ColumnInfo.h This file defines column information class of various types.
00025  */
00026 
00027 //
00028 #include "calvin_files/portability/src/AffymetrixBaseTypes.h"
00029 //
00030 #include <cstring>
00031 #include <string>
00032 #include <vector>
00033 //
00034 
00035 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00036 #pragma warning(disable: 4290) // don't show warnings about throw keyword on function declarations.
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00040 {
00041 
00042 /*! Data dataSet column data types */
00043 enum DataSetColumnTypes {
00044         ByteColType,
00045         UByteColType,
00046         ShortColType,
00047         UShortColType,
00048         IntColType,
00049         UIntColType,
00050         FloatColType,
00051         ASCIICharColType,
00052         UnicodeCharColType
00053 };
00054 
00055 /*! Base class for the varous columns */
00056 class ColumnInfo
00057 {
00058 private:
00059         /*! Name of the column. */
00060         std::wstring name;
00061         /*! Type of data in this column */
00062         DataSetColumnTypes type;
00063         /*! size of an individual element in bytes */
00064         int32_t size;
00065         /*! number of elements in column */
00066         int32_t len;
00067         /*! overhead size in bytes */
00068         int32_t overhead;
00069 
00070 protected:
00071         /*! Constructor - used only by dervied types
00072          *      @param name_ Name of the column.
00073          *      @param type_ Type of data in the column.
00074          *      @param size_ Size of each element of in the column.
00075          *      @param len_ Number of elements of type in the column.
00076          *      @param overhead_ Number of extra bytes in the column
00077          */
00078         ColumnInfo(const std::wstring& name_, DataSetColumnTypes type_, int32_t size_, int32_t len_, int32_t overhead_);
00079 
00080 public:
00081 
00082         /*! Constructor - used by the file read operation
00083          *      @param name_ Name of the column.
00084          *      @param type_ Type of data in the column.
00085          *      @param totalSize Total size of the colum in bytes.
00086          */
00087         ColumnInfo(const std::wstring& name_, DataSetColumnTypes type_, int32_t totalSize);
00088 
00089         /*! Equiality operator
00090          *      @param p object to compare against
00091          */
00092         bool operator==(const ColumnInfo &p) const { return (name == p.name && type == p.type && size == p.size); }
00093 
00094         /*! Inequiality operator
00095          *      @param p object to compare against
00096          */
00097         bool operator!=(const ColumnInfo &p) const { return (name != p.name || type != p.type || size != p.size); }
00098 
00099         /*! Returns the type of the data in the column
00100          *      @return The type of the data in the column
00101          */
00102         DataSetColumnTypes GetColumnType() const { return type; }
00103 
00104         /*! Returns the total size of the column in bytes.
00105          *      @return Size in bytes of the column
00106          */
00107         int32_t GetSize() const { return size*len + overhead; }
00108 
00109         /*! Returns the number of elements of type in the column
00110          *      @return Number of elements of type in the column
00111          */
00112         int32_t GetLength() const { return len; }
00113 
00114         /*! Get the column name.
00115          *      @return The column name.
00116          */
00117         std::wstring GetName() { return name; }
00118 };
00119 
00120 /*! Byte column */
00121 class ByteColumn : public ColumnInfo
00122 {
00123 public:
00124 
00125         ByteColumn(const std::wstring& name_) : ColumnInfo(name_, ByteColType, sizeof(int8_t), 1, 0) {}
00126 };
00127 
00128 /*! Unsigned byte column */
00129 class UByteColumn : public ColumnInfo
00130 {
00131 public:
00132 
00133         UByteColumn(const std::wstring& name_) : ColumnInfo(name_, UByteColType, sizeof(u_int8_t), 1, 0) {}
00134 };
00135

00137 class ShortColumn : public ColumnInfo
00138 {
00139 public:
00140 
00141         ShortColumn(const std::wstring& name_) : ColumnInfo(name_, ShortColType, sizeof(int16_t), 1, 0) {}
00142 };
00143 
00144 /*! Unsigned short column */
00145 class UShortColumn : public ColumnInfo
00146 {
00147 public:
00148 
00149         UShortColumn(const std::wstring& name_) : ColumnInfo(name_, UShortColType, sizeof(u_int16_t), 1, 0) {}
00150 };
00151 
00152 /*! Int (int32_t) column */
00153 class IntColumn : public ColumnInfo
00154 {
00155 public:
00156 
00157         IntColumn(const std::wstring& name_) : ColumnInfo(name_, IntColType, sizeof(int32_t), 1, 0) {}
00158 };
00159 
00160 /*! Unsigned int (u_int32_t) column */
00161 class UIntColumn : public ColumnInfo
00162 {
00163 public:
00164 
00165         UIntColumn(const std::wstring& name_) : ColumnInfo(name_, UIntColType, sizeof(u_int32_t), 1, 0) {}
00166 };
00167 
00168 /*! Float column */
00169 class FloatColumn : public ColumnInfo
00170 {
00171 public:
00172 
00173         FloatColumn(const std::wstring& name_) : ColumnInfo(name_, FloatColType, sizeof(float), 1, 0) {}
00174 };
00175 
00176 /*! ASCII string column */
00177 class ASCIIColumn : public ColumnInfo
00178 {
00179 public:
00180 
00181         ASCIIColumn(const std::wstring& name_, int32_t maxLn) : ColumnInfo(name_, ASCIICharColType, sizeof(int8_t), maxLn, 4) {}
00182 };
00183 
00184 /* Unicode string column */
00185 class UnicodeColumn : public ColumnInfo
00186 {
00187 public:
00188 
00189         UnicodeColumn(const std::wstring& name_, int32_t maxLn) : ColumnInfo(name_, UnicodeCharColType, sizeof(int16_t), maxLn, 4) {}
00190 };

00192 /*! vector of column info */
00193 typedef std::vector<ColumnInfo> ColInfoVector;
00194 
00195 /*! iterator of column info */
00196 typedef std::vector<ColumnInfo>::const_iterator ColumnInfoConstIt;

00198 }
